channel.title: How to hack NeoPets?
channel.description:
If a person wanted to hack a game such as NeoPets, what would he have to learn how to do?
Any specific programming languages?

item.title: How to hack NeoPets?
item.dc:creator: @unlimitedorb unlimitedorb
item.description:
@unlimitedorb wrote:

It’s still possible to hack Neopets, but it would take a certain amount of skillful social engineering unless you get lucky and find a major SQL injection exploit or maybe a vulnerability in their servers; you never know. For instance, I thought that all the XSS exploits Neopets had were exhausted until a couple of hours ago, there’s an actual public exploit out there right now waiting to be exploited. But since it’s a non-persistent XSS you’ll still have to incorporate a certain amount of social engineering. If you play your cards right, you may be able to commandeer a neopets moderator account and who knows what else? I’m not exactly sure what their administration system has as far as web based features, but you may be able to do things such as freeze other players, delete threads on various boards, etc.

If you do decide to exploit any XSS bugs, then I suggest you read up on AJAX and other ways to send HTTP requests without page refreshes. Don’t screw up by making a simple window.document.location, I wrote a paper on this and posted it on milw0rm a while back: Cookie Stealing Upgrade AJAX Style. Looking back on it, I see there are a few errors but the gist of the document remains true even to this day.

If people ever tell you that it’s impossible to hack Neopets, then it’s because they are tired of hearing the question over and over again or they heard from a “friend” that it’s impossible. Don’t be discouraged because I can virtually guarantee you there’s a way somehow, even if it means for you to walk up to their offices with a shotgun and a grenade with the cap popped off…there’s a way.

Read full topic

item.title: How to hack NeoPets?
item.dc:creator: @TheDarkMage TheDarkMage
item.description:
@TheDarkMage wrote:

First of all, find out what’s in the packet that you send out when you try to log on to Neopets.

Second of all, build a virus that makes more servers to flood the Neopets server and when you get a right password and log in it sends it back to your computer (obviously have it delay or else you’ll be flooded as well)

Third of all, send out your c-dos attack (chain dos, i made it up as far as I know) to get everyone’s usernames and passwords!

Warning! Whatever is written in this thread is to be considered for informational uses only. Any unlawful acts will not be held responsible by the poster.

Read full topic

item.title: How to hack NeoPets?
item.dc:creator: @Yoshi0308 Yoshi0308
item.description:
@Yoshi0308 wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:2, topic:52252”]Well, hack is such a vague word. It all depends on how you define hack.

Neopets was made in php(afaik), so knowledge of PHP would surely help. But really there are no known ways of just h4xoring it to get unlimited NP’s etc…

You could “hacK” the flash games with a memory editor, such as cheatengine… However you pretty much get banned within a few hours.[/quote]

[quote=“1337h4x, post:3, topic:52252”]Well, virginity is a vague word. It all depends on how you lose it.

Neopets was made in a strip club (kaifa), so knowledge of STRipping would surely help. But really there are no known ways of just s3xoring it to get unlimited unvriginity’s etc…

You could “sexS” the horny people with a vibrating dildo, such as fleshlight… However you pretty much get raped within a few hours.[/quote]

item.title: How to hack NeoPets?
item.dc:creator: @elfonso elfonso
item.description:
@elfonso wrote:

You would need to learn the language VB6 (C++ and C# would do very nicely also, but Vb6 is much easier)

After you learn Vb6, you will need to understand how to use a shockwave object in it, use the flash1.getvariable command and then how to decompile a flashwave object.

There is no way to “dupe” Np, or to hack the game in any other way then to edit the flash games.

Read full topic
